##Base R functions and operators



###dataframe

###subset
columnwise subset
Use `$` operator
Use matrix notation *df*[,*column number*] or *df*[, *"column name"*]

* e.g.
```{r, comment=""}
head(mtcars)
```

```{r, eval=F, comment=""}
head(mtcars$mpg)
head(mtcars[,1])
head(mtcars[,"mpg"])
```

```{r, echo=F, comment=""}
head(mtcars$mpg)
```


rowwise
Use matrix notation *df*[*row number*,] or *df*[*"row name"*, ]
```{r, eval=F, comment=""}
mtcars[1,]
mtcars["Mazda RX4",]
```

```{r, echo=F, comment=""}
mtcars[1,]
```
